statements: SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE reminder_sent = true;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_id = 5;
SELECT patient_id, reminder_sent FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE reminder_sent = true;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-06-01' AND reminder_sent = false ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY appointment_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE therapist_id = 1
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE patient_id = 3
SELECT therapist_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_time BETWEEN '13:00:00' AND '16:00:00'
SELECT * FROM PatientReminders WHERE reminder_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_message FROM PatientReminders WHERE patient_id = 10

SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, therapist_id FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT therapist_id, count(*) as appointments_count FROM Appointments GROUP BY therapist_id HAVING appointments_count > 5 ORDER BY appointments_count DESC;

SELECT * FROM Appointments INNER JOIN PatientReminders ON Appointments.patient_id = PatientReminders.patient_id WHERE Appointments.appointment_date = PatientReminders.reminder_date AND Appointments.appointment_time = PatientReminders.reminder_time ORDER BY Appointments.appointment_date ASC, Appointments.appointment_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, MIN(appointment_date) as first_appointment_date, MAX(appointment_date) as last_appointment_date FROM Appointments GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY patient_id;

SELECT therapist_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(appointment_date, reminder_date)) as avg_days_between_appointment_and_reminder FROM Appointments INNER JOIN PatientReminders ON Appointments.patient_id = PatientReminders.patient_id GROUP BY therapist_id ORDER BY avg_days_between_appointment_and_reminder DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_gender FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, patient_name FROM Appointments JOIN Patients ON Appointments.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE appointment_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT reminder_date, reminder_message FROM Reminders WHERE patient_id = 3 ORDER BY reminder_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT appointment_type, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM staff WHERE role = 'Doctor';
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date, appointment_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_type FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' AND appointment_type = 'Check-up' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;

SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT staff_id, first_name, role FROM staff WHERE role IN ('Doctor', 'Nurse') ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_date, reminder_text FROM reminders ORDER BY reminder_date DESC, reminder_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, reason FROM appointments WHERE reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT clinic_name, address, phone_number FROM clinic ORDER BY clinic_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM therapists WHERE specialization = 'Psychologist';
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, email, phone_number FROM patients;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, reason, patient_id FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_id, reminder_message, reminder_date, reminder_time FROM reminders ORDER BY reminder_date DESC;
SELECT therapist_id, full_name, specialization FROM therapists WHERE specialization = 'Physical Therapy';
SELECT clinic_name, address, phone_number, email FROM clinic WHERE address LIKE '%Main Street%';
